channel.title: ...nah
channel.description:
How do you tell if you exist? if you exist, how do you know if you're dreaming or in a catatonia? is death an answer to this questions? if any of this questions have no answer for anyone who tries to find it, that person should enjoy his/her doubtful existance?
...

item.title: ...nah
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“Nokturth, post:23, topic:418495”][quote author=triston001 link=topic=521033.msg3853888#msg3853888 date=1324230678]
okay, this is on my side of expertise since i been studing parapsycology for a while now, yes, u can know when ur dreaming if u try, some tips on this is to train urself to respond to out of place things and sometimes you will just realize that this is a dream but u just flow with it and soon forget again, u can also keep something on the top of your mind and keep trying to not lose sight of reality as u fall asleep. u can practice lucid dreaming in ur own dream as soon as you realize that u are dreaming. it is pretty fun to change your environment but u must change a part of it to where it looks off and u know ur dreaming and dont fall out off lucidity. u can tell when are dreaming and not with practise

i know since ive done it for about 5 years to my knowledge
[/quote]

i’ve done this… changing dreams thing for more than 14 years because i had a terrible nightmare and fear made me control xD

the answer about if you’re dreaming or really existing is that in dreams you “teleport” and has no real time line, that in “real” life you have, you remember the path to the bathroom, to a park, to a store.
still there’s no answer for the katatonia, but now i don’t really care[/quote]

very awesome reply

Read full topic

item.title: ...nah
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Yours doesn’t make sense.
Would’ve been better as:
The only statement that is bullshit is yours.
Therefor the above statements resolve the true.
Therefor your statement is false.

item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“walkineagle, post:15, topic:418495”]The only thing that doesn’t exist is inexistence.
Therefor only existence exists.
Therefor we exist.
/mindblown[/quote]
The only statement that is bullshit is not this one.
Therefore only the above statement resolves to false.
Therefore bullshit is cowshit.
/mindblown

item.title: ...nah
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:12, topic:418495”][quote author=Nokturth link=topic=521033.msg3786891#msg3786891 date=1318964185]

um, you can’t?

the only example that really applies to this reality/non-reality stuff is dreaming, and you can often tell when you’re in a dream. but there’s no way of proving to yourself that you’re not dreaming.

i don’t really understand what this discussion is about. lucid dreaming is an interesting topic !

you cant tell you were in a dream until after youve woken up

you can if you have enough control in your own mind, i’m rusty on it, but some time ago i did controlled my dreams while sleeping. but if you’re dreaming inside a dream? still there’s no way to tell

this aint inception

and theres no way to practice control over your own dreams

try to control them, that’s the practice.
also, never saw inception, but then maybe we can use another words, a dream inside a catatonia?
[/quote]would that not be the same as a normal dream?[/quote]

no, a catatonia is kinda a mental disease which makes you create a new reality or modify it (involuntary).
it doesn’t matter anyways, there’s no answer to most of this questions

Read full topic

item.title: ...nah
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

yeah it is possible to tell when you’re in a dream, but maybe it takes practise or only certain people can do it? usually people panic a little when they realise they’re dreaming and wake themselves up, but the key is to stay calm and try not to actively think about it.

also, we need to go deeper.

Read full topic

item.title: ...nah
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

CoonHunter:

There are many forms of existence. A car can exist in theory, and later exist as an object. A dream is an idea, and does exist. The ‘real’ side of a dream can only be judged by the beholder.

what i said, it exist in someone’s mind, but how to judge it’s reality?

Read full topic
